memberdef.name: Mtx44

briefdescription.para: Default Constructor. Default values are zero.

parameterdescription.para: to a33 - Initial values for the matrix in (row, column) format

briefdescription.para: Constructor with array of 16 floats. Default values are zero.

parameterdescription.para: - Initial values for the matrix in column major format

briefdescription.para: Copy constructor.
Set the matrix to an identity matrix (1's along the diagonal)
Set this matrix to its Transpose.
Set this matrix to zero.
Return a new matrix that is a transpose of this matrix.
Return a new matrix that is an inverse.

parameterdescription.para: thrown if the determinant of the matrix is zero

briefdescription.para: operator* overload for matrix-matrix multiplication
operator+ overload for matrix-matrix addition
operator= overload for assignment
operator* overload for scalar multiplication
operator* overload for matrix-vector3 multiplication

memberdef.argsstring: (float degrees, float axisX, float axisY, float axisZ)
memberdef.name: SetToRotation

briefdescription.para: Set Matrix to a rotation matrix about arbitrary axis.

parameterdescription.para: Angle of rotation, in degrees, clockwise
Thrown if rotation axis is a zero vector

briefdescription.para: Set this matrix to a scaling matrix with scale factors sx, sy and sz.
Set this matrix to a translation matrix with translation of (x, y, z)

memberdef.argsstring: (double left, double right, double bottom, double top, double near, double far)
memberdef.name: SetToFrustum

briefdescription.para: Set this matrix to frustum matrix.

memberdef.argsstring: (double eyeX, double eyeY, double eyeZ, double centerX, double centerY, double centerZ, double upX, double upY, double upZ)
memberdef.name: SetToLookAt

briefdescription.para: Set matrix to be a lookat matrix.

memberdef.argsstring: (double fovy, double aspect, double zNear, double zFar)
memberdef.name: SetToPerspective

briefdescription.para: Set matrix to be a perspective matrix.

memberdef.name: SetToOrtho

briefdescription.para: Setup orthogonal matrix.
A 4 by 4 matrix.
